trans-unit.source: Represents controls that visually expand to display content and collapse to hide content.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controlos de visualmente expandir para apresentar o conteúdo e fechar para ocultar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Aggregate controls—built with child objects that provide the UI for expand/collapse functionality—must support the ExpandCollapsePattern control pattern while their child elements do not.
trans-unit.target: Agregar controlos — criadas com objetos subordinados que fornecem a IU para a funcionalidade de expandir/fechar — tem de suportar o padrão de controlo de ExpandCollapsePattern enquanto não os respetivos elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: For example, a combo box control is built with a combination of list box, button, and edit controls, but it is only the parent combo box that must support the ExpandCollapsePattern.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um controlo de caixa de combinação é criado com uma combinação de caixa de listagem, botão e controlos de edição, mas é apenas a caixa de combinação de principal tem de suportar o ExpandCollapsePattern.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A menu control, even though an aggregate of individual menu items, is an exception to this rule.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um controlo de menu, mesmo que um agregado individuais de itens de menu, é uma exceção a esta regra.

trans-unit.source: The menu items support the ExpandCollapsePattern control pattern, but the parent menu control does not.
trans-unit.target: Os itens de menu suportam o controlo de ExpandCollapsePattern padrão, mas não o controlo de menu principal.

trans-unit.source: A similar exception applies to the tree and tree item controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção de semelhante aplica-se a árvore e controlos de item de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Hides all descendant nodes, controls, or content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oculta a todos os nós subordinados, controlos ou conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking method that returns after the UI Automation element has been collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método de bloqueio que devolve depois do elemento de automatização de IU foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: There are cases when a UI Automation element that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the Collapse or the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Existem casos, quando um elemento de automatização de IU que está marcado como um nó de folha poderá não saber se tiver subordinados até que a fechar ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento é possível com um árvore controlo de vista que suporta um atraso de carregamento da respetivas itens subordinados.

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] pode apresentar o ícone de expansão de um nó, apesar de não existem atualmente quaisquer itens de subordinados; quando se clica no ícone, o controlo de consulta para itens subordinados, localiza nenhum e remove o ícone de expansão.

trans-unit.source: In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A> property by registering an event handler with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nestes casos clientes devem escutar para um evento de alterar a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>propriedade ao registar um processador de eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Collapse is called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fechar é chamado quando a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mostra todos os nós subordinados, controlos ou conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking method that returns after the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> has been expanded.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método de bloqueio que devolve depois do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi expandido.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: There are cases when a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> or the Expand method is called.
trans-unit.target: Existem casos quando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>que está marcado como um nó de folha poderá não saber se tiver subordinados até que o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A>ou o método de expansão é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento é possível com um árvore controlo de vista que suporta um atraso de carregamento da respetivas itens subordinados.

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] pode apresentar o ícone de expansão de um nó, apesar de não existem atualmente quaisquer itens de subordinados; quando se clica no ícone, o controlo de consulta para itens subordinados, localiza nenhum e remove o ícone de expansão.

trans-unit.source: In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A> property by registering an event handler with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nestes casos clientes devem escutar para um evento de alterar a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>propriedade ao registar um processador de eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Expand is called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Expanda é chamado quando a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState> refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>refere-se para a visibilidade dos objetos de subordinados imediatos apenas; não se refere a visibilidade dos objetos subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
